enWisdom: Moderation makes [that which is] little grow [and increase]

Wisdom: خُذِ الْقَصْدَ فِي الْأُمُورِ فَمَنْ أَخَذَ الْقَصْدَ خَفَّتْ عَلَيْهِ الْمُؤَنُ
enWisdom: Be moderate in [your] affairs, for whoever is moderate, the burden of his expenses is lightened
Whoever is moderate, the burden of his expenses is lightened

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالْقَصْدِ فِي الْأُمُورِ فَمَنْ عَدَلَ عَنِ الْقَصْدِ جَارَ وَمَنْ أَخَذَ بِهِ عَدَلَ
enWisdom: You must be moderate in your affairs, for the one who deviates from moderation is unjust and one who takes to it is just

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالْقَصْدِ فَإِنَّهُ أَعْوَنُ شَيْ‏ءٍ عَلَى حُسْنِ الْعَيْشِ وَلَنْ يَهْلِكَ امْرُؤٌ حَتَّى يُؤْثِرَ شَهْوَتَهُ عَلَى دِينِهِ
enWisdom: Espouse moderation, for indeed it is the most helpful thing in attaining a fruitful life; and a person will never be destroyed until he prefers his lust over his faith

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِالْقَصْدِ فِي الْمَطَاعِمِ فَإِنَّهُ أَبْعَدُ مِنَ السَّرَفِ وَأَصَحُّ لِلْبَدَنِ وَأَعْوَنُ عَلَى الْعِبَادَةِ
enWisdom: Espouse moderation in food, for indeed it is farther from extravagance, healthier for the body and more assisting in the performance of worship
One who desires security should adopt moderation

Wisdom: مَنِ اقْتَصَدَ فِي الْغِنَى وَالْفَقْرِ فَقَدِ اسْتَعَدَّ لِنَوَائِبِ الدَّهْرِ
enWisdom: One who is moderate in [both] affluence and poverty has prepared himself for the calamities of time

Wisdom: مَنْ صَحِبَ الِاقْتِصَادَ دَامَتْ صُحْبَةُ الْغِنَى لَهُ وَجَبَرَ الِاقْتِصَادُ فَقْرَهُ وَخَلَلَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever adopts moderation, it will make his prosperity last and will make up for his poverty and deficiency
One who is moderate will never be ruined
There is no wastage in moderation

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُحْسِنِ الِاقْتِصَادَ أَهْلَكَهُ الْإِسْرَافُ
enWisdom: One who does not practice moderation is ruined by extravagance
There is no ruin with moderation
